svg.content: <mxfile host="www.draw.io" modified="2019-11-08T17:24:28.649Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.15; rv:70.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/70.0" etag="yUdzLC4ZThXIYLRULEeI" version="12.2.3" type="device" pages="4"><diagram id="PJwAysw0SInvG_4xoFqA" name="Auth + Full Indirection"></diagram><diagram name="Auth + Partial Indirection" id="9SQoglv1ZkYKYngeZ4Xq"></diagram><diagram name="Auth + Minimum Indirection" id="ZTgdXitA1l3z70bPyuRE"></diagram><diagram name="Key Mgm + Full Indirection" id="sMN2xGHwCz4uCRt8k8Ta"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 96px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 100px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
2. Client sends
user's email to server

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 56px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
3. Server sends
user's email &
API Key to Simple ID

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
4. Simple ID sends
server OTC (One-Time Code)

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
8. Server sends
user's email, OTC &
API Key to Simple ID

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
9. Simple ID returns
app specific keypair, wallet
addresses etc. to server

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
10. Application logs
user in with blockchain
platform capabilities

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
11. Client (or Server)
is now capable of
encryption, signing, &
storage on Blockchain
platforms.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 150px; max-width: 570px; width: 570px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: left;

div.h1: Use Case: Simple ID Authorization with Application Server Full Indirection
div.div: All transactions with Simple ID are indirected through the Application server. Authorization is accomplished with Simple ID generated One-Time Codes (OTCs). Post log-in transactions can occur with blockchain & blockchain plaform resources through the server or direct from the client (the choice is the application

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
5. Server sends
user OTC (One-Time Code)
via email / SMS ...
